body_html: API owner comment: Should use python.util.nest.flatten() to accept arbitrary nesting of lists, tuples, etc. Don't worry about collections.Iterable, flatten() will handle the common sequence types. Otherwise this looks good.
body_text: API owner comment: Should use python.util.nest.flatten() to accept arbitrary nesting of lists, tuples, etc. Don't worry about collections.Iterable, flatten() will handle the common sequence types. Otherwise this looks good.
